content: basket weave hat for adults video tutorial https //youtu be/sln4umwykiy materials needed u s h-8 5mm crochet hook #4 medium-weight yarn scissors stitches used chain chain stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet fldc front loop double_crochet bldc back loop double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet gauge information 4 x 4 swatch = 13 fpdc stitches x 9 row of fpdc pattern foundation ring- chain 4 slip_stitch into first chain to create foundation ring round 1- †chain 3 10 double_crochet into foundation ring slip_stitch into top of first double_crochet 10 round 2- †chain 3 2 double_crochet into each st around slip_stitch into top of first double_crochet 20 round 3- †chain 3 *1 fldc into next st 2 fldc in next stitch repeat from * 9 more times slip_stitch into top of first fldc 30 round 4- †chain 3 *1 fldc into next 2 stitches 2 fldc in next stitch repeat from * 9 more times slip_stitch into top of first fldc 40 round 5- †chain 3 *1 bldc into next 3 stitches 2 bldc in next stitch repeat from * 9 more times slip_stitch into top of first bldc 50 round 6- †chain 3 *1 bldc into next 4 stitches 2 bldc in next stitch repeat from * 9 more times slip_stitch into top of first bldc 60 round 7- †chain 2 1 half_double_crochet into each st around slip_stitch into top of first half_double_crochet 60 round 8- †chain 3 1 double_crochet into each st around slip_stitch into top of first double_crochet 60 round 9-11- †chain 2 *1 fpdc into next 3 stitches bpdc into next 3 stitches repeat from * 9 more times slip_stitch into top of first fpdc 60 round 12-14- †chain 2 *1 bpdc into next 3 stitches fpdc into next 3 stitches repeat from * 9 more times slip_stitch into top of first bpdc 60 round 15-18- †chain 2 *1 fpdc into next 3 stitches bpdc into next 3 stitches repeat from * 9 more times slip_stitch into top of first fpdc 60 notes † do not count chain 3 as double_crochet
